alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 4:57PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Ellis County through 530 PM CDT... At 457 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Higgins, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arnett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
